name: Faiz Arif U P
bio: System Engineer | Linux | Web Hosting | MCA TKM'24 | Co-Founder - TinkerHub FC

top_projects.name: Image-Captioning
top_projects.description: A mini project using Deep Learning.

readme_content: # Hi there 👋, I'm Faiz Arif U P. ### Farook College, Kerala, India. ### About: - 👨🏻‍💻 I am an enthusiastic and dedicated IT professional with a strong academic foundation and practical experience in technology and systems management. - 🎉 Currently, I am working as a Junior System Engineer at SupportSages Pvt Ltd, where I am honing my technical skills and contributing to impactful projects. Previously, I served as the IT Coordinator at NEST Public School, managing IT infrastructure, teaching IT lessons, and enhancing the school’s digital presence. - 🌟 In addition, I co-founded TinkerHub FC at Farook College Campus under the TinkerHub Foundation. During my tenure, I played a pivotal role in organizing tech events, fostering community learning, and serving in the Tech Team to build a vibrant technology ecosystem on campus. - 🎓 I hold a Master of Computer Applications (MCA) from TKM College of Engineering, where I gained a solid technical foundation and hands-on experience in software development and Linux systems. - 💡 I am passionate about using technologies to solve real-world challenges, building innovative solutions, and continuously learning to stay ahead in the dynamic IT landscape. Let’s connect and explore opportunities to collaborate! --- ### Skills: - Linux - Web Hosting - Web Dev - Python - Java - HTML - CSS - JS - C --- [![trophy](https://github-profile-trophy.vercel.app/?username=FaizArifUP&theme=onedark)](https://github.com/ryo-ma/github-profile-trophy) [![Top Langs](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api/top-langs/?username=FaizArifUP&layout=compact&theme=radical)](https://github.com/anuraghazra/github-readme-stats) ![GitHub stats](https://github-readme-stats.vercel.app/api?username=FaizArifUP&show_icons=true&theme=radical) --- #### Connect With Me: [](https://github.com/FaizArifUP) [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/faizarifup/) [](https://www.facebook.com/faiz.arif.3701) [](https://www.instagram.com/faiz_arif_/) [](https://twitter.com/faizarifup) [](https://codepen.io/faizarifup)
profile_summary: seasoned IT professional with over a decade of combined academic and practical experience in technology and systems management. I am enthusiastic about leveraging my skills in C, Python, and Java to develop innovative solutions, manage systems, and drive impactful projects. As a Junior System Engineer at SupportSages Pvt Ltd, I am continuously honing my technical expertise and contributing to exciting initiatives, while also serving as a co-founder of TinkerHub FC and driving efforts in tech events, community learning, and tech ecosystems within the college campus and beyond. Let's connect and explore opportunities to collaborate!
